bug.author: JPhilipp
bug.summary: Yaml Config help misses learning_rate_schedule property
bug.description: The <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/ml-agents/blob/master/docs/Training-ML-Agents.md>documentation of the Yaml config parameters</denchmark-link> is missing an explanatory entry for the optional property, described more <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/ml-agents/blob/master/docs/Training-PPO.md#optional-learning-rate-schedule>here</denchmark-link> . (Sorry, not a bug, but didn't find a better fitting label.)

comments.comment: thanks <denchmark-link:https://github.com/JPhilipp>@JPhilipp</denchmark-link> for spotting the missing definition. We will update the docs accordingly.
